sentence.Network_en: Will they farm the rest of their land less intensively?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会在其余土地上实施较轻程度的集约化耕种吗？

sentence.Network_en: Ruth's parents opted to educate her intensively at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 露丝的父母选择了在家对她进行集中教育。

sentence.Network_en: The calves are grazed intensively during their first season.
sentence.Network_cn: 小牛在生长的第一季里集中喂养.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 四级真题词汇 - 豆丁网 ... insignificantly 无价值地 intensively 集中地 largely 大部分.
求英语四级高频词... ... extensive discussion 广泛的讨论 intensively adv. 加强地，集中地，深入细致地 intensive reading 精读.
暴烈祝贺跨级海量选择题... ... fierce 意为“猛烈的”； intensively 意为“集中地，彻底地”； extremely 意为“极端地，非常地”；.
21世纪大学英语读写教程单... ... alma mater n. 母校 intensively ad. 加强地； 集中地； 密集地； 透彻地 ignorance n. 无知， 愚昧.

list.abs: 医学用语_百度文库 ... pediatric a. 儿科的 intensive a. 加强的；集中的 separate a. 单独的；分离的.
通名有内涵（intension）有外延（extension）。内涵代表对象的根本属性，外延是名称所适用的对象的集合。
强字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 强调〖 stress;emphasize〗 强度〖 intensity〗 强渡〖 forcedferry〗.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... defective a. 有缺点的；有缺陷的 intensity n. 强烈，剧烈 completion n. 完成，结束；完满.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... intention n 故意 intense a 强烈的，热烈的 intensify v 变猛烈；加强.

entry.def: Intensive activity involves concentrating a lot of effort or people on one particular task in order to try to achieve a great deal in a short time.

example.ex: ...several days and nights of intensive negotiations...
example.tran: 几天几夜紧锣密鼓的谈判

example.ex: Each counsellor undergoes an intensive training programme before beginning work.
example.tran: 每个辅导员在上岗前都要接受密集培训。

entry.tran: 集约(经营)的;精耕细作的
entry.def: Intensive farming involves producing as many crops or animals as possible from your land, usually with the aid of chemicals.

example.ex: Elsewhere large areas have been drained and levelled for industry or intensive farming.
example.tran: 在别处,大片区域被抽干了水或铲平了地，以作为工业或集约化农业用地。
饲养家禽的集约化方法

auth_sentence.content: "It is wonderful how he experiences all moments of this trip really intensively, " Lombardi said.

sentences.en: The calves are grazed intensively during their first season.
sentences.cn: 小牛在生长的第一季里集中喂养。

sentences.en: The land here has been intensively cultivated for generations.
sentences.cn: 这片土地经过了几代人的集约耕作。
